name: Fileblaze
overview:
Fileblaze is a professional cloud-based storage, sharing and streaming system that makes it practical to securely share massive quantities of media and documents. Every feature is optimized to deliver a super-fast navigation and streaming media experience.

Fileblaze is built with the digital professional in mind to help prevent piracy, leaks and unauthorized downloads on copyrighted material. The application is differentiated by its speed, richness, simplicity and easy-to-use digital rights management (DRM) tools. No software is required and it’s as easy as sending an email.

Fileblaze offers many unique features, including instant web preview, download control, link expiration, multitasking and encryption. Fileblaze develops enterprise solutions and apps for businesses, including custom piracy prevention and DRM tools, watermarking, encryption, large file transfer, real-time preview, media streaming, web hosting and publishing, file analytics, cloud storage, data warehousing and file backup.

The company is headquartered in San Francisco and is funded by angel investors. Our alpha release, FB 1, privately attracted some of the biggest names and companies in the media and entertainment industry. Everyday, thousand of professionals trust Fileblaze to securely transfer and preview sensitive files. Our commercial release, FB 2, represents over 250 feature and security enhancements, including a sleek new graphical user interface (GUI).

The patent pending Fileblaze technology is the cleanest (green) technology in its class. It processes a minimal, fixed amount of RAM regardless of the data transfer size. By compressing files for preview purposes, it reduces the need to download larger, uncompressed file formats that consume more memory and bandwidth.

Fileblaze works on all web browsers and requires high-speed Internet access, Flash Player 9 and 1 GB in RAM. No software downloads or configuration is necessary.
